channel.title: Changing the path of a client?
channel.description:
My client has a cache. The cache has to be in your C:/ drive. Is there anyway to have the cache in your D:/ drive and have the client work?
I've tried putting it in the D:/ but the client can't find anything.
Help?

item.dc:creator: @slogieftw slogieftw
